query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() AND TABLE_NAME = 'reviews';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2yoFfYif5LNxbni.536e2831ff0e --database ZpobkhoyuogEaApEUcL3SK --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() AND TABLE_NAME = 'reviews';
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	COLUMN_TYPE
id	int(11)
projectId	int(11)
trackId	int(11)
userId	int(11)
reviewType	enum('track','album','comparison')
modelUsed	varchar(100)
